title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
Hello my friend, I don't have this electrical scheme, but I imagine it looks or feels like 820-00840, I used it as a reference. No signs of oxidation, no image, cooler turns sometimes and the external ssd turns on the led. 
 

voltage:
PPbus_g3h 13.0v; PP3v42_g3h; PP3v3_g3h 3.41V; PPDCIN_G3H 20.2v; PP20V_USBC_XA_VBUS_F 20.2; ALL_SYS_PWRGD 3.21V; PP3V3_G3H_UPC_XB 3.31V; PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD 1.8V; PP5v_s0 5.11V.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
PPBUS_G3H looks correct and you get even S0 volatges; why wasting time measuring USB-C area then?

So your board powers on, but doesn't work; there is a difference, don't get confused.

Check L7210/20 voltage.
Did you check for USB activity?

[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Wgr8exOQxJcQzhZV-N4PwlQbxhJ8tEB_/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
voltage: 
CPUVR_SW1/PPVCCCPU_S0G_PH1 0.98V; PP3V_S0 3.31V; PP1v8_S0 1.81V; PM_SLP_S0_L 3.32V; P5VS0SW_CT2  9.95V.

Mac recognizes the external SSD, but the system that is on the ssd does not start. No image on external HDMI.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
The Link LED of external SSD adaptor flashes?
That is the sign to confirm USB activity...

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: No. It just stays on.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
Then is no USB activity.
BTW, get this
[URL unfurl="true"]http://www.cmizapper.com/products/usb-tester.html[/URL]
for the future.

Try known good BIOS...

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: Coloquei esse BIOS que você me deu e ainda tem o mesmo defeito. A placa não apresenta sinais de oxidação, as tensões estão boas, não sei onde pode estar o problema, você já viu algum desses casos?

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: I put this BIOS that you gave me and it still has the same defect. The plate has no signs of oxidation, the voltages are okay, I don't know where the problem may be, have you caught any cases like that?

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: U7370, u3900 and u3200 are the hottest components in the thermal camera.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: u3100 when changing the USB-C port it does not have heating in the thermal camera, only the u3200.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
You said USB adapter has light on.
Is that Link LED, or just power LED?
A normal USB adapter for SSD/HDD should have 2 LEDs...

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: the two HDD leds are on, but the reading LED does not flash, so the HDD is not being read.

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: May be bad CPU then...

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message: u7330 would not influence this HDD reading?

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
I cannot find U7330 in schematic.
Do you mean u7370 instead?

Do you get correct voltage at L7370?
The board will not work without that voltage...

title: 820-00875-01 no power
message:
sorry, u7370 the right. 
L7370  1.04V.
